parameters.name: Component
parameters.description: Component in which to modify the feature (see Remarks )

title: IBoundaryBossFeatureData.AccessSelections
description: Gains access to the selections that define this boundary feature.
signature:
System.Boolean AccessSelections( 
   System.Object
TopDoc
,
   System.Object
Component
)

parameters.name: Component
parameters.description: Component in which to modify the feature (see Remarks )

returns: True if the selections are successfully accessed, false if not
remarks:
To modify a feature in a...
Then...
Part
TopDoc argument is the
ModelDoc2
object for the part
Component argument is Nothing or null
Assembly
TopDoc is the ModelDoc2 object for the assembly
Component argument is the
Component2
object in which to modify the feature
This method puts the model into a rollback state to allow access to the selections that define this feature. You must use either of the following methods to restore the rollback state:
IFeature::ModifyDefinition
if you modified the feature
IBoundaryBossFeatureData::ReleaseSelectionAccess
if you did not
